item.title: About me
item.description: Hello my name is Ben, I am from Leeds in the UK. I have lived in UK all my life, I currently live in London as I am undertaking my Masters at London Business School. I enjoy reading, politics and going to the cinema. I am also trying to learn french as it is one of my life goals to learn a new language.

item.title: Cat pictures
item.description: Here are some prictures of my cat Luna!

item.title: Education
item.description: I have received the following grades from my studies: GCES 2A+ 3A 5B A Level Economics A Government and Politics A Mathematics B Undergraduate Bsc Economics and Political Science, Upper Second class Masters Masters in Financial Analysis, ongoing

item.title: Example of Work
item.description: # Make sure you use vroom() as it is significantly faster than read.csv() library(patchwork) library(tidyverse) # Load ggplot2, dplyr, and all the other tidyverse packages library(mosaic) library(ggthemes) library(lubridate) library(fivethirtyeight) library(here) library(skimr) library(janitor) library(vroom) library(tidyquant) library(rvest) # scrape websites library(purrr) library(lubridate) #to handle dates df1 <- read_csv(here::here("data","CA_contributors_2016.csv")) df2 <- read_csv(here::here("data","zip_code_database.csv")) ## Warning: 333 parsing failures. ## row col expected actual file ## 3241 world_region 1/0/T/F/TRUE/FALSE EU 'C:/Users/benma/OneDrive/Documents/LBS/Data for Finance/Website999/data/zip_code_database.csv' ## 3244 world_region 1/0/T/F/TRUE/FALSE EU 'C:/Users/benma/OneDrive/Documents/LBS/Data for Finance/Website999/data/zip_code_database.
